Bhena bhagavā attano pitaraṃ suddhodanamahārājānaṃ ‘‘atikkantavarā kho gotama tathāgatā’’ti avoca. Vessavaṇopi mahārājā bhagavantaṃ ‘‘vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, buddhaṃ vandāma gotama’’nti avoca, āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ‘‘sādhu nibbāpanaṃ brūhi, anukampāya gotamā’’ti avoca. Evaṃ idaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ gaṃ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana gotamagottakassapagottādivasena bahuvidhaṃ.
